weekly_top_story.headline: Bulgaria joins eurozone, adopts euro as official currency becoming 21st member
weekly_top_story.summary: Bulgaria's adoption of the euro marks the culmination of its long EU integration journey since 2007, strengthening economic ties within the bloc and leaving only six EU states outside the eurozone.

stories.headline: Russia says Ukrainian drone strike kills 24 in occupied Ukraine as tensions grow amid peace talks
stories.summary: A Ukrainian drone strike on a hotel and cafe in occupied Ukraine reportedly killed 24 people, including a child, escalating tensions as Russia claims a record 4,300 drones downed in December while Kyiv vows to expand long-range strikes.

stories.headline: Iran protests spread over ailing economy, at least 6 reported dead
stories.summary: Protests in Iran over economic woes have resulted in at least six deaths, signaling deepening public discontent amid ongoing financial struggles.

stories.headline: Flash floods triggered by heavy rains in Afghanistan kill at least 17 people
stories.summary: Heavy rains ending a dry spell in Afghanistan caused flash floods that killed 17 and injured 11, highlighting vulnerability to climate extremes in the region.
